metadata.title: CVE-2024-39908 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: REXML is an XML toolkit for Ruby. The REXML gem before 3.3.1 has some DoSvulnerabilities when it parses an XML that has many specific characterssuch as `<`, `0` and `%>`. If you need to parse untrusted XMLs, you many beimpacted to these vulnerabilities. The REXML gem 3.3.2 or later include thepatches to fix these vulnerabilities. Users are advised to upgrade. Usersunable to upgrade should avoid parsing untrusted XML strings.

criterions.comment: ruby2.5 package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
jruby package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
